CurrentView.short_help: Represents the currently active view for this frame window
CurrentView.description: The CurrentView variable represents the currently active view for this frame window.

TransportView.short_help: Represents this frame window's transport controls view

ToolView.short_help: Represents this frame window's Tool controls view

TimelineView.short_help: Represents this frame window's Timeline view

TimeRulerView.short_help: Represents this frame window's time ruler

ModifierView.short_help: Represents this frame window's Modifier controls view

ConsoleView.description: The ConsoleView variable represents the FuView object used to displayany scripting message, and to allow script commands to be entered.

FlowView.short_help: Represents this frame window's Flow view
FlowView.description: The FlowView variable represents the FuView object used to displaythe various tool connections for the frame's Composition.

RightView.short_help: Represents this frame window's right display view
RightView.description: The RightView variable represents the right-hand GLView object used todisplay images, 3D scenes and other parameters output by a tool.

LeftView.short_help: Represents this frame window's left display view
LeftView.description: The LeftView variable represents the left-hand GLView object used todisplay images, 3D scenes and other parameters output by a tool.

SplineView.short_help: Represents this frame window's spline editor view

Composition.description: The Composition variable represents the Composition object that thisframe window is displaying.

InfoView.short_help: Represents this frame window's Info view
InfoView.description: The InfoView variable represents the FuView object used to displayany general notes for the frame's Composition.

SwitchView.short_help: Displays a given view within this frame
SwitchView.description:
where 'id' is the ID of one of the views in the frame.
 e.g. 'FlowView', 'ConsoleView', 'TimelineView', 'SplineEditorView'

ViewOn.short_help: Displays a tool on a numbered view
ViewOn.description:
where 'view' is a number from 0..9.
If 'tool' is omitted, the currently active tool is used.
If 'tool' is nil, the view is cleared.
If no arguments are supplied, all views are cleared.

GetViewList.short_help: Returns the list of views within this frame
GetViewList.description:
where 'table' is a table of the FuView objects in the frame,
and entries are named by the view's ID string.
